text: Mba ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi gari guman panan vhari, mba ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi gari gɨmatɨva pana manin kamgim, mani ana han zim, ana khaŋ mani ga nzuai, “Ŋko ŋgɨp, 200 ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi ndigɨp, mbaram 70 ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi thari phorgɨ ndigiri, mbe hozi ndigiri. Ŋko vhɨra harigi 200 ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi thari phorgɨ ndigiri, mbe fugi suigiri. Ŋko mbe bevahegɨp, nde 9 kirok maan Sisarian ŋgirɨri.
